Perceptor:

Perceptor smiled "Then go to mess hall, Hydras is screaming up to 
new comer so his temper will be pretty bad for a while." He walked 
along side DeathSteel.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> DeathSteel::
> 
> He smiled and turned to face Perceptor. "I think I will drink to 
that 
> idea. You who are wise can show me to curb my temper and I will 
show 
> you a trick or two about the youth of this age. But new and 
improved 
> doens't mean it is better than tried and true." he said with a 
> smile. "Teach me, so that I may be a better bot than I am."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > Perceptor laughted and said "I'm old, young one, enough old due 
> I've 
> > learned not trust in any one, due that I'm alive. I see that 
you're 
> > a perfect warrior and willing to learn  new things... Why not we 
> > drink something and chat a while, we can learn a lot things each 
> > othet... What do think? "
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> 
wrote:
> > > DeathSteel::
> > >  
> > > He looked at Perceptor, noting the tone of the bot's 
> voice. "Look, 
> > > how in the pit is one to learn how to fit in around here if no 
> bot 
> > > will talk to you, show you around, or even give you a task to 
> > > complete? Since I am new, I can safely bet you don't trust me. 
So 
> > how 
> > > in the pit am I to prove anything if nobot will give up that 
> > chance 
> > > to prove it?" He turned and took a step towards the doorway. 
He 
> > > stopped and looked at Perceptor. "You should try to put worthy 
> > bots 
> > > around you. It would make you look like a true leader, one who 
> > could 
> > > see how to use the talents around him." With that, he turned 
and 
> > > walked out into the hall. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:

> > > > 
> > > > "What're you doing here???"said Perceptor with suspicion
> > > >

<logomorph@h...>

stood

arms 
> > in

would 
> > > lower
